Text:
If you want to change the settings of the game:

1. Go to your Applications folder.
2. Right click on "Pro Evolution Soccer 2013".
3. Show Package Content.
4. Open "Wineskin".
5. Click on Advanced.
6. Click on Browse.
7. Select "Settings.exe"(:drive_c/Program Files/Konami/Pro Evolution Soccer 2013 DEMO/).
8. Then click on "Test Run".
9. Change your settings.
10. Click on Browse again.
11. Select "pes2013-unlock.exe"(:drive_c/Program Files/Konami/Pro Evolution Soccer 2013 DEMO/).
12. Close all and run the Application!
